title: This is why the Mac Studio with M1 Ultra weighs 2 pounds more than the M1 Max
content:
Apple revealed the all-new Mac Studio during its Peek Performance event earlier this week. This latest desktop computer from the company is a unique addition to the Mac lineup — despite it featuring some familiar elements. For example, while it looks like two stacked Mac Minis, it is powered by a freshly-introduced M1 Ultra chip.

The post This is why the Mac Studio with M1 Ultra weighs 2 pounds more than the M1 Max appeared first on xda-developers.
description: The Mac Studio with the M1 Ultra chip weighs two pounds more than that with the M1 Max chip. Here's the reason behind this difference.
